sections.title: Objectives
content: Software Engineer with a strong passion for building reliable and impactful systems. After a career in telecom, I transitioned into software development because I enjoy problem-solving and creating solutions that drive value.

My experience includes working with technologies like Python, Django, Docker, and PostgreSQL, as well as contributing to the development and maintenance of a SaaS platform. As the DevOps Engineer for the SaaS startup, I managed deployment pipelines, optimized workflows, and ensured smooth operations across development and production environments.

I‚Äôm eager to continue growing my skills, taking on meaningful projects, and collaborating with teams to create effective and scalable solutions. I‚Äôm seeking opportunities such as a Software Engineer, Backend Developer, Python Developer, DevOps Engineer, or Full Stack Engineer, where I can contribute to impactful work while continuing to expand my expertise in the field.

content.title: Software Engineer/DevOps Engineer
content.text: Developed a greenfield SaaS platform that streamlined RV dealership workflows, reduced financing turnaround times, and improved user efficiency. Scaled the engineering team and implemented Agile practices to ensure consistent delivery.

content.title: Senior Manager
content.text: Led a team of 34 engineers supporting 21 telecommunications platforms, optimizing equipment management and reducing outages by 80% with innovative software solutions.

content.title: Senior Manager
content.text: Directed teams supporting telecom hardware and software, improving system reliability through advanced troubleshooting and documentation. Introduced Lean methodologies to enhance operational efficiency and reduce waste.
